Making people aware is important, but more important is to convert awareness into action. Clean India - Is attitude change more important than the movement?
Hello this is monica.I am from hyderabad.Clean India is my topic today and all i know about this is to keep our city clean n neat.i personely be very perticular about neatness so i will do what all i have to do, like as a good citizen i have never thrown anything on road and in open areas.i will always use dustbins near to me.Now our country is in Swatchbarath Movement which was interduced by prime minister Narendra Modi. awareness programs for people by sectioning the cities and even some motivation programs.By all these activities there will be some change in people, and the main problem is of people attitude.By conducting all these sessions we may make people aware of the programe which was interduced,but the important thing is how many are implementing these actions.There are very less people how are into this action,for making this sucessfull every citizens should be part of this.There is no need of any position to be given,as a good citizen it is there duty to make others to implement the same thing, by doing this slowly people wil get used to it.When ever they see such things happening even they will stop other to do.Alone the government cannot do the whole part so its our responsbility to implement.In this the recent activity which govt took was Green and Blue buckets system.One is for dry waste and another is for wet,by knowing this i was very excited that this was a super good thing to our city. and i took those two bins and i gave to those GHMC people who collect the waste everyday,and that man dumped the two into one,here the fellow wasted my actions too.I was very upset that i have done the duty as a citizen but it resulted in other way.By this i came to know that government should give strict rule to the government workers and even strict actions for not implementing properly.As per the senario government took another action,by interducing public toilets but those are not available properly throught the city so it was not that sucessfull.

                                                As per my opinion not only awareness but changing the people thoughts that they are the one who should take actions and implement the rules which are passed by government.So both the awareness and the awareness into actions are important,for this movement government should take the actions to get change in the people attitude and this will definetly lead the movement to sucessed
